unnormalised: Boreponno lokanno, zakaat kaydeancher uloyaam. Mhaka khobor asa, “zakaat” ani “vinod” he donuy shabd eksarkhe aikunk bore disonaat, kiteak laser pointer-an bill’lleank ektthaim korunk sodchem te bhaxen zata. Punn mhaka sangata divo, kiteak spoxtt sangtaam, ami hasle na zalear, ami amchea Form 16-anchea udkant rudon poddttole.
normalised: Borem asa lokanno, ami tax kaydeacher ulo koruya. Mhaka khobor asa, "tax" ani "vinod" hea utrancho ektthaim mell kitlo sohojik dista mhonnlear zati-zhogddim korunk laser pointer vaprunk sodlea bhaxen. Punn mhaka sangata di, kiteak mhonnlear, soglem mellun ami hasunk naslear, ami amchea Form sixteenant dukam ghaltole.

unnormalised: Tor, Section 80C, pagar mellpi modhya vargacho mogacho rakhonnddar, tumkam tumchea zakaat gheunk yogya aslolea utponnantlean ₹1.5 lakh kamik korunk ditolo. To tumcho tho ek ixtt bhaxen, zo kedna-i tumkam bhair kaddtta, punn pizza poixeam bodlek, to tumkam Income Tax Dept-achea hatantlean bachavta. Tum tumche ELSS investment, tumche LIC premium, ani tumchea bhurgeanche tuition fees meren bhortat. Tem multh’thvean financial Jenga bhaxen; tumi khup block bhair kaddtlear sogllem moddun vetolem.
normalised: Tech bhaxen, Section eighty C, pogaar gheunchea modhyom vorgachea mogall rakhonn dhoronek, tumchea taxable incomeantlean rupee ek point panch lakh uune korunk melltta. To tumcho ek tho mitracho vago asta zo tumkam sodanch maddot korta, punn pizza duddu diunchea bodlek, to tumkam Income Tax D-e-p-t. chea tabentlean vattaita. Tum tumchea E-L-S-S investments, tumchea L-I-C premiums, ani tumchea bhurgeanche tuition fees bharta. Tem ek torechem financial Jenga asata; tum bhair zaitim blocks kaddttlear soglem poddonk lagta.

unnormalised: Aata GST, vo vostu ani seva zakaat. Ekuch zakaat, te sangtale. Sopeponnan, te sangtale. Tem suryachim kirnnam ani indradhanush bhaxen astolem, te sangtale. Mhaka mell’llem tem Mumbai-chea pausallea bhaxen – kitin-kitin asta, kallzak kitlem lagta tem sangunk zainam ani tumi tumchea samosak kitem dar lagta tem sodunk duddo zatat. Tem 5% asa? Tem 12% asa? Fokot GST Council-ak khobor asa! Ani spoxtt sangtaam, tim azunui tea vixoyancher zhogddim kortolim.
normalised: Atam, G-S-T, vo Goods and Services Tax. Ekloch tax, te mhonnlo. Sompem, te mhonnlo. To uzvadd ani dhonu-bannachea vago astolo, te mhonnlo. Punn amkam mell'llem Mumbai-che monsoona bhaxen – kitin' kotinn, anpekhit, ani tumchi chamddi olomb zatoli tumkam somzonk kiteak konnso dar lagunk zai tumchea samosasacher. Tem panch percent asa? Tem bara percent asa? Fokot G-S-T Council-ak khobor asa! Ani sattekai, te sangatan zagdda kortole ami ulo kortana.

unnormalised: Ani zakaat auditachi soglli khanni asa. Zori tumchi girestkay eka nischit xim’mak pautli (mhaka dista tem Rs. 10 Cr. atam kaink vevsaayam khatir), tumkam ek chartered accountant zai tumchea hisobancho ek chokor gheunk. Tem doktora bhaxen tumchem cholesterol check kortolem, punn statins divchea bodlek, te ani-i spreadsheets divtolim. Ani zori tumi tumchea hisobam sangata thodde “creative” zalear, borem mhunncho, tumkam ek boro vakil zai poddttolo (Adv. Sharma khub boro asa, mhaka aikunk mell’llam).
normalised: Uprant tax auditacho sogleacho itihas asa. Tumchea turnover-an ek threshold ulaangddailear (mhaka dista tem rupee dha crore atam kaim vevsayan khatir), tumkam ek chartered accountant zai tumchea pustokanchem nirikshonn korunk. Tem toxem zata zoxem ek doctor tumcho cholesterol check korta, punn statins diunchea bodlek, te odik spreadsheets ditat. Ani tum “creative” asa tumchea accountingachern, zalear mhaka dista tumkam ek boro lawyer zai astolo (A-d-v. Sharma boro asa, mhaka aikunk mellta).

unnormalised: Nimannem, zakaat kaido Bollywood dance number bhaxen – kitin-kitin, rongit, ani tumkam kedna-i khobor nasleli kitem cholta. Punn hey, ami soglle eksarke asat, sori? Aata, tumi mhaka maaf korta zalear, mhaka vochunk zai kiteak mhoje chai khorch kaink gunngutt kalaman kamik korunchem vo na tem sodunk. Mhaka subecha divo!
normalised: Nidannak, tax kaido ek torechem Bollywood danz number asa – kotinn, rongit, ani tumkam kednach khobor nasona kitem cholta mhonn. Punn hey, atam ami soglem ektthaim asat, sori? Atam, tum mhaka maf kara, mhaka vochunk zai kiteak mhaka shodunk zai mhazo chai kharcho deductible asa konnchea tori dhunvddunk launchea clauseant. Mhaka subhechch dhi!
